price: Et Nous avons déjà apporté à Moïse et Aaron le (Livre du) discernement (la Thora) ainsi qu’une lumière et un rappel pour les gens pieux,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā wahārūna al-fur'qāna waḍiyāan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqīna
